title: Renting vs. Owning - Making Informed Housing Decisions
description: This chapter explores the financial and lifestyle implications of renting versus owning a home, helping students develop the skills to make informed housing decisions based on their personal circumstances and goals.
learning_objectives: Compare the financial implications of renting versus owning a home
Identify key factors that influence housing decisions
Evaluate how personal circumstances affect housing choices
Analyze the long-term financial impact of different housing options
Apply critical thinking to housing scenarios based on different life situations

skill_builder.title: Comparing Housing Options Based on Priorities
skill_builder.description: An interactive activity where students evaluate the pros and cons of different housing options based on their top three personal priorities.
